snippet.title: Shokudo Underworld Has Arrived: Your Culinary Adventure Begins Today!
snippet.description:
Hey there, fellow gamers!

Thank you all for waiting~ We are thrilled to finally announce the launch of Shokudo Underworld on Steam!

We welcome you to step into a whimsical underground world and embark on a culinary adventure as a reincarnated corporate worker. Manage your own restaurant, serve up delicious and bizarre dishes, and explore the depths of this strange new realm.

Access & Purchase Information:

- Check out our Steam Page https://store.steampowered.com/app/3050530?utm_source=Social&utm_term=YouTube (Enjoy a 10% discount for a limited time!)
- Available Platform: PC (Windows and macOS)

Key Features:

- The Mystical Shokudo: Serve up delicious dishes on time to earn tips, experience, and cute gacha prizes. Meanwhile, make wishes to the gods and harness their divine power to upgrade your restaurant and attract more customers!
- The Quirky and Eerie Art: Delight in the most “adorable” cartoon characters and immerse yourself in an authentic restaurant environment with a mystical atmosphere.
- The Enchanting Music: Experience an original soundtrack with Japanese shokudo themes that transport you to a magical world.

About Our Team:

- Miluku Inc. – Freshly brewed games, straight from the source!
- We are a new indie game studio founded by four passionate university graduates. While none of us studied game design, our shared dream of crafting a fantastical world inspired us to start this studio, and the excitement of bringing our vision to life continues to fuel our motivation.

Get ready to cook, serve, and conquer the Underworld!
